Package game.ui

package game.ui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BestTimesScreen
     
    ControlsPanel
    The ControlsPanel class displays the game controls as an attractive, modern overlay panel.
    DropUpControlPanel
    A panel that displays a drop‑up button in the bottom‑left corner.
    GameCompleteScreen
    The screen shown when all levels are completed.
    GameOverScreen
    Represents the Game Over screen shown when the player loses.
    LevelCompleteScreen
    Represents the Level Complete screen shown when a player finishes a level.
    PauseOverlayPanel
    A semi-transparent overlay panel used for pausing the game.
    StartupScreen
    The main entry point and title screen for the 2D platformer game.
